page.title: 08ON OUR ROAD
page.content: We see cars,most of the time going to Bourne all others are going to Grantham.Near Grantham there is a trunk road called the A1.It is sometimes called the Great North Road.All the way through Edenham there is a thirty miles an hour speed limit.We can see lots of cars from the School playground.Sometimes we can see family cars and chauffeur driven Rolls Royces,Minis and Range Rovers.Farmers drive Land Rovers and mostly Tractors.In Summer we see cars pulling Caravans going on holiday.Some Caravans are just going and others are just coming back.Some people take the bus so they can go shopping,go to work or going on a School outing.We see Army trucks go by.The soldiers are learning to drive an Army truck.The Army base is in Grantham.Some of the Army vehicles go by are School.
